SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KUMMUN.TB_MES_ORD_MST T
AND WORKS_CD = (SELECT CODE_ETC FROM GOLDMOON.TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = #{worksCd})
AND TO_DATE(ORD_DD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_DATE(ORD_DD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT WORKS_CD, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM GOLDMOON.TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_KIND = 'MESFTR' AND CODE_ETC = T.WORKS_CD) AS WORKS_NM, FAC_CD, ORD_NO AS MES_ORD_NO, BARLIST_CD, ORD_STATUS_CD, ORD_COMP_CD, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ORD_DD, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORD_DD, CUST_CD, (SELECT CUST_NM FROM KUMMUN.TB_MES_CUST_INFO WHERE CUST_TP = '1' AND WORKS_CD = T.WORKS_CD AND CUST_CD = T.CUST_CD) AS CUST_NM, CON_REGION, CON_SEQ, CON_ZONE, TOLRC_LOSS_RATE, CONT_FLAG, CONT_CD, CREATED_OBJECT_ID, CREATED_PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_OBJECT_ID, LAST_UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID, LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, PART, (SELECT SUM(ORD_TOT_PCS_CNT) FROM KUMMUN.TB_MES_ORD_DTL WHERE ORD_NO = T.ORD_NO) AS ORD_TOT_PCS_CNT FROM KUMMUN.TB_MES_ORD_MST T
T.ORD_NO NOT IN (SELECT MES_ORD_NO FROM TB_SD04M01_MES WHERE MES_FTR_CD = T.WORKS_CD AND MES_ORD_NO = T.ORD_NO)
AND WORKS_CD = (SELECT CODE_ETC FROM GOLDMOON.TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = #{worksCd})
AND TO_DATE(ORD_DD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{startDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_DATE(ORD_DD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
ORDER BY ORD_DD DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} AND #{lastIndex}

SELECT WORKS_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM GOLDMOON.TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_KIND = 'MESFTR' AND CODE_ETC = T.WORKS_CD) AS WORKS_NM , FAC_CD , ORD_NO AS MES_ORD_NO , BARLIST_CD , ORD_STATUS_CD , ORD_COMP_CD , (SELECT CUST_NM FROM KUMMUN.TB_MES_CUST_INFO WHERE WORKS_CD = T.WORKS_CD AND FAC_CD = T.FAC_CD AND CUST_TP != '1' AND CUST_CD = T.ORD_COMP_CD) AS ORD_COMP_NM , ORD_DD , CUST_CD , (SELECT CUST_NM FROM KUMMUN.TB_MES_CUST_INFO WHERE CUST_TP = '1' AND WORKS_CD = T.WORKS_CD AND CUST_CD = T.CUST_CD) AS CUST_NM , CON_REGION , CON_SEQ , CON_ZONE , TOLRC_LOSS_RATE , CONT_FLAG , CONT_CD , CREATED_OBJECT_ID , CREATED_PROGRAM_ID , CREATION_TIMESTAMP , LAST_UPDATED_OBJECT_ID , LAST_UPDATE_PROGRAM_ID , LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP , PART FROM KUMMUN.TB_MES_ORD_MST T WHERE WORKS_CD = #{worksCd} AND FAC_CD = #{facCd} AND ORD_NO = #{mesOrdNo} AND BARLIST_CD = #{barlistCd} AND ORD_STATUS_CD = #{ordStatusCd}

SELECT M.WORKS_CD , M.FAC_CD , M.ORD_NO AS MES_ORD_NO , M.ORD_LINE_NO AS MES_ORD_LINE_NO , M.ORD_TOT_WGT AS ODR_WT , M.ORD_TOT_PCS_CNT AS ODR_QTY , B.PRDT_CD , B.PRDT_NM , B.PRDT_DIV , B.PRDT_STKN , B.PRDT_ERQK_YN , B.PRDT_SIZE , B.PRDT_SPEC , B.PRDT_COIL_YN , B.PRDT_UNIT , B.PRDT_CNVRSN_WT , B.PRDT_WT , B.PRDT_UPR , B.PRDT_UPR ODR_UPR , M.ORD_TOT_PCS_CNT * B.PRDT_UPR AS ODR_AMT , B.PCHS_UPR , B.SELL_UPR , B.PRDT_DT , B.PRDT_DK_CD , B.PRDT_MES_CD , B.USE_YN , B.RMK , B.ETC_FIELD1 , B.ETC_FIELD2 , B.ETC_FIELD3 , B.CREAT_ID , B.CREAT_PGM , B.CREAT_DTTM , B.UDT_ID , B.UPD_PGM , B.UDT_DTTM , B.PRDT_LEN , B.PRDT_STOCK_CD FROM KUMMUN.TB_MES_ORD_DTL M LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM01M01_MES E ON M.DIMS_CD = E.MES_DIMS_CD AND M.WORKS_CD = E.MES_FTR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM01M01 B ON E.PRDT_CD = B.PRDT_CD WHERE M.WORKS_CD = #{worksCd} AND M.FAC_CD = #{facCd} AND M.ORD_NO = #{mesOrdNo}
